description: A featureSet object contains the geometry and attributes of features in a layer. This object is used with feature collections only.
title: featureSet

___features.description: An array of feature objects containing geometry and a set of attributes.

$eref.description: Contains information about an attribute field and feature geometry.
$eref.title: feature

___attributes.description: The feature attributes. A JSON object that contains a dictionary of name-value pairs. The names are the feature field names. The values are the field values, and they can be any of the standard JSON types: string, number, and boolean. Note that date values are encoded as numbers. The number represents the number of milliseconds since epoch (January 1, 1970) in UTC.

___symbol.description: Symbol used for drawing the feature.

___geometry.description: It can be any of the supported geometry types.
